dialog.body: Hello, thank you for contacting Old Stone Auto Insurance. My name is Thomas Jackson. May I have your name, please?
Nice to meet you, Ruth. Could you please provide me with your policy number for verification purposes?
Sure, the policy number is five six eight zero two.
Thank you, Ruth. Additionally, could you confirm the street address associated with your policy account?
The street address is two three one Pine Street.
Great, thank you for confirming the details, Ruth. Is there anything specific I can assist you with today regarding your policy or a recent incident?
I need to add a new vehicle to my policy.
Of course, Ruth. I can help you with that. Let's proceed with adding the vehicle. Can you provide me with the make and model of the new vehicle?
Perfect, Ruth. Thank you for providing the details. I will update your policy with the new vehicle information. Thank you for your time today. Is there anything else you need assistance with?
